title: Speaker's handling of Gaza vote very concerning, says Rishi Sunak
description: Sir Lindsay Hoyle is facing mounting pressure to quit as Commons Speaker over his handling of a vote on Gaza. SNP Westminster leader Stephen Flynn said his decision to pick a Labour motion had seen Parliament "descend into farce". He added his party no longer had confidence in him, and called for a Commons vote on his future.
